ygData.subject: Troll SK questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I finally made 15th last night! Wohoo! I have only used Clinging Darkness 2 times so far but have not been able to judge how effective it is. Now for my
ygData.messageBody:
I finally made 15th last night! Wohoo!
I have only used Clinging Darkness 2 times so far but
have not been able to judge how effective it is.
Now for my question, hopefully Brian can answer this one
for me.
Does Intelligence influence how often you hit your
target in melee? Or is it the level of the target?
In Lavastorm last night while fighting with a DE SK I
noticed that I miss ALOT. This formed a pattern that
while he was hitting often verses a non-elemental/drakes
I was not.
I tried slight movement of my view to see if target
placement and closeness was a factor and it did not seem
to be so. My Int is 62, and his I'm not sure of, but it
is alot higher even at DE default value.

Second Question.
I am planning on entering South Karana to kill aviaks,
or enter Splitpaw. How bad is the KoS factor for a Troll
SK there? I wil be entering from Feerot.
Thanks.

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
15th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
